Type.BattleDialog: My eyes shall look straight ahead as we advance.
We will not expose our back to the enemy.
To become a dragon of the battlefield, honorable and courageous…
No matter what you do, maintain a sound body and mind.
It may not be the kind of task we usually handle, but surely it can be dealt with in the same way.
Remember the protocol… Let’s not get nervous.
I am not afraid. Moving out!
The Liu is overpowered by none.
We must be quick to go on the offensive.
One’s actions should not be a detriment to all.
It’s hardly believable that such amateurs made it to this grade…
Regardless, we’ve accomplished the given mission… Let us go back.
It’s not a good idea to become overconfident in victory.
I won’t take pity on the opponent.
A smooth triumph. Let’s take the books we were requested to retrieve and return.
I’d hate to drag others down…
I don’t want to give in at this point…
How rash… A single mistake resulted in this…
Hesitation would only be a roadblock…
It would seem… I’ve reached my limit.
We can’t afford to dwell on personal feelings.
…All we can do is move onward in silence.
It’s still difficult to stay composed over someone’s demise.
…The offensive must continue.
We can’t back down now, despite the risk.
I wish for the rest of our combat to resolve swimmingly like just now.
Inviting people to a fight with such a lax mindset was your mistake.
I won’t let a single second pass in vain or let a single foe escape my notice.
In moments like this, your weapon is the one thing you can rely on.
Such feeble attacks won’t get through.
Focus. They aren’t pushovers by any means.
Cecil, Mei. Are you ready?
As long as our body and mind are sound, the results won’t betray us.
Don’t be scared. Remember that the key to the enemy’s defeat is within yourselves.
I understand that you’re tired, but don’t forget to take the books.
Victory was already in our hands when we entered, so it was inevitable that the enemy lost.
…At least, I could do something for my own sake till the end.
I’m sorry… Thank you for your efforts.
Your will shall carry on… I swear to win this battle.
…Should we pull back? No, the situation isn’t right yet…
In difficult situations, be on the defensive.
Even if everyone else dies, as long as one person stands… There’s still a chance to win.
The battle isn’t over yet. Stay focused!
We’re pressing on further. This isn’t over just yet…
Even the most rigorously trained soldier has weaknesses in body and mind.
Yessir! Going forth right away.
We shall not let them attack us from our back. We’ll push forward with a steadfast spirit.
We will advance before the enemy can assume a formation!
I think the intel we got here will prove to be handy.
I wonder if Section 1 has finished their work by now. Shall we head back?
Perhaps I wasn’t fit… to best a Star of the City.
Now is the time for action! Don’t be discouraged!
We can endure this. We won’t lose…
With the right mindset… We can overcome situations like this.
We will retaliate with even greater strength!
A clean finish.
They’re almost finished… We’ll charge further into their ranks!
I’m not exhausted in the slightest; I feel like I’m on fire!
I’m prepared! Moving out now.
There aren’t too many foes!
Know your enemy and know yourself! Then you won’t falter after a hundred fights.
I was just starting to get warmed up… That’s a bit of a shame!
That was an easy formation to break!
Sorry, director… I could’ve toughed it out…
I won’t stop here! Giving up would be a rude thing to do to all my colleagues that have passed away.
The battle is ongoing… It’s not finished yet!
Can’t let them have it their way… HERE I COME!!!
I’m not foolish enough to let such a casualty surprise me.
Things seem to be on a smooth track!
Is everyone alright? We should know when to advance and when to hold our position.
It’s too late to hope for victory when the battle has already begun!
